name: Fuzzy Climb
description:
Fuzzy Climb is a 2D Platformer game done for the 2015 Global Game Jam.

You are a small lint ball trying to escape the depths of a woman's purse and reach the top to be free! However, it isn't easy. Her purse if rather messy and she tends to drop things into it constantly!

A- Move Left.

D- Move Right

Space- Jump

Mouse - Controls Light

R - Reload Stage

X - Motivation!

If you find any sound related bugs, just press R and reload the stage.

We intend to continue on with this project and make it a larger game. If you enjoy it, spread it around and keep playing! Thank you!

Created by:

Cameron Denton - Programming, Level Design

Kalynn Walker - Art Assets, Programming

David McKee - Music, Sound Design
